title: Fractured Fairy Tales
description: Once upon a time…, Happily ever after…all of the fairy tales we know and love begin and end the same, but what if they were altered? Fractured? Would the magic still happen? Does that happy ending still come at the stroke of midnight or with a kiss? Join this group of SaSSy authors as they take you on a journey, weaving their own magic and putting a spin on the fairy tales we all know and love to support Make-A-Wish Foundation.
author: Amy Marie
